comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110407 Firefox/4.2a1pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110407 Firefox/4.2a1pre

It seems to be the case that a change since 4.0 has broken orca's caret navigation on help -> about minefield. 

Lets try to find a regression range for this.

This might be a core gecko issue but lets see what we find in investigation

Reproducible: Always
